refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the full path on disk or full phar URL to the currently executing Phar archive

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns the filename if valid, empty string otherwise.

&reftitle.examples;
A Phar::running example
For the following example, assume the phar archive is located at /path/to/phar/my.phar.
<?php $a = Phar::running(); // $a is "phar:///path/to/my.phar" $b = Phar::running(false); // $b is "/path/to/my.phar" ?>
